PEOPLE.name: Qianqian Xie
PEOPLE.title: Professor; Ph.D. Supervisor; Deputy Director of the Center for Language and Information (CLAIN), Wuhan University
PEOPLE.titleZh: 教授；博士生导师；武汉大学语言与信息研究中心副主任
PEOPLE.bio: Prof. Qianqian Xie is a Professor at the School of Artificial Intelligence, Wuhan University, and the Deputy Director of the Center for Language and Information (CLAIN). She has long been engaged in research on natural language processing, medical AI, intelligent finance, model interpretability/controllability and reasoning, and multimodal fusion. She previously served as an Associate Research Scientist at Yale University, and has worked or conducted academic visits at Cornell University, the University of Manchester, and the University of Montreal. She has published over 70 papers in top conferences and journals such as NeurIPS, ACL, KDD, Nature Communications, and TKDE. She has led the NIH K99/R00 Pathway to Independence Award, NIH Early-Stage Researcher Grant (USD 830K), and the 2025 CCF–Tencent Rhino-Bird Fund. She is a recipient of the National High-level Young Talent Program (Overseas). Her honors include the Hubei Provincial Science and Technology Progress Award (2nd Class) and the CCL Outstanding English Paper Award. She serves as Senior Area Chair of EACL 2025 and Area Chair for ACL 2023/2025, EMNLP 2023/2025, NeurIPS 2025, COLING 2025, LREC 2026, and as Co-chair of the COLING 2025 Workshop.
PEOPLE.bioZh: 谢倩倩，武汉大学人工智能学院教授、博士生导师，武汉大学语言与信息研究中心副主任。长期从事自然语言处理、医疗人工智能、智能金融、模型可解释性/可控性与推理、多模态融合等方向研究。曾任耶鲁大学副研究员，并在康奈尔大学、曼彻斯特大学和蒙特利尔大学工作与访问。在 NeurIPS、ACL、KDD、Nature Communications、TKDE 等国际顶级会议与期刊发表论文 70 余篇；主持美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）青年研究基金项目（约 83 万美元）、NIH K99/R00 青年独立研究者基金，以及 2025 年 CCF-腾讯犀牛鸟科研基金项目。国家高层次海外优青获得者；曾获湖北省科技进步二等奖、CCL 亮点英文论文奖等。担任 EACL 2025 资深领域主席，ACL 2023/2025、EMNLP 2023/2025、NeurIPS 2025、COLING 2025、LREC 2026 等领域主席，并任 COLING-2025 Workshop 大会联合主席。

PEOPLE.name: Sophia Ananiadou
PEOPLE.title: Professor of Computer Science, University of Manchester
PEOPLE.titleZh: 英国曼彻斯特大学计算机科学教授
PEOPLE.bio: Sophia Ananiadou is a Professor in Computer Science at the University of Manchester and Director of the National Centre for Text Mining (NaCTeM), the world's first publicly funded text mining centre, and an adjunct professor at Wuhan University. She is a leading expert in biomedical text mining and natural language processing, with interdisciplinary contributions to knowledge discovery, automated systematic reviews, and AI applications in biomedicine. She is a Turing Fellow, ELLIS Fellow, and has been ranked #1 internationally in text mining.
PEOPLE.bioZh: Sophia Ananiadou 是英国曼彻斯特大学计算机科学系教授；National Centre for Text Mining (NaCTeM) 主任；该中心是世界上首个公共资助的文本挖掘中心，同时担任武汉大学兼职教授。她是生物医学文本挖掘与自然语言处理领域的世界顶尖专家之一，长期致力于该领域的交叉应用，在生物医学知识发现、系统综述自动化等方面具有开创性贡献。她是 Turing Fellow 和 ELLIS Fellow，并在文本挖掘领域国际排名第一。

PEOPLE.name: Min Peng
PEOPLE.title: Professor
PEOPLE.bio: Min Peng is a Professor at the School of Artificial Intelligence, Wuhan University, Director of the Center for Language and Information Research, and PhD Supervisor. She is a member of IEEE CIS ETTC, council member of China Chinese Information Society, committee member of Computational Linguistics Specialty Committee and Social Media Processing Specialty Committee of Chinese Information Society. She received her PhD in Computer Software and Theory from Wuhan University and conducted postdoctoral research at the Advanced Cyber-Infrastructure Laboratory, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of New Mexico, USA. Her long-term research focuses on artificial intelligence, natural language processing, information retrieval, topic models, knowledge graphs, cloud computing systems, and social computing.
PEOPLE.bioZh: 彭敏，武汉大学人工智能学院教授、语言与信息研究中心主任、博士生导师。IEEE CIS ETTC会员，中国中文信息学会理事，中文信息学会计算语言学专委会委员、社会媒体处理专委会委员。曾获武汉大学计算机软件与理论专业博士学位，曾在美国新墨西哥大学电子与计算机工程系Advanced Cyber-Infrastructure Laboratory从事博士后研究。长期从事人工智能、自然语言处理、信息检索、主题模型、知识图谱、云计算系统与社会计算方向研究。

NEWS.title: Award Announcement | SecureFinAI Contest 2025
NEWS.summary: Congratulations to our team Fin Sentry, composed of Ziyan Kuang, Yining Qiu, and Youzhong Dong, for achieving Third Place in both Task I and Task II of the SecureFinAI Contest 2025, held at ACM ICAIF 2025. Supported by the AI4Finance Foundation, the SecureFinAI Contest focuses on advancing financial AI agents in areas such as reinforcement learning for trading, financial large language models, and compliance-oriented intelligent systems. The outstanding performance of our team highlights the group’s strong capabilities in financial machine learning and FinAI applications. Congratulations to the award-winning team.
NEWS.summaryZh: 热烈祝贺我组学生况紫嫣、仇仪宁、董又中组成的队伍 Fin Sentry 在 ACM ICAIF 2025 – SecureFinAI Contest 2025 中取得优异成绩，分别在 Task I 和 Task II 两个赛道均获 第三名。比赛由 AI4Finance Foundation 支持，重点面向金融智能体在强化学习交易、金融大模型与合规分析等方向的创新应用。团队在本次竞赛中的表现充分展示了我组在金融智能领域的研究实力。
NEWS.content:
Award Announcement | SecureFinAI Contest 2025

Congratulations to our team Fin Sentry, composed of Ziyan Kuang, Yining Qiu, and Youzhong Dong, for achieving Third Place in both Task I and Task II of the SecureFinAI Contest 2025, held at ACM ICAIF 2025.

Supported by the AI4Finance Foundation, the SecureFinAI Contest focuses on advancing financial AI agents in areas such as reinforcement learning for trading, financial large language models, and compliance-oriented intelligent systems. The outstanding performance of our team highlights the group’s strong capabilities in financial machine learning and FinAI applications.

Congratulations to the award-winning team.
NEWS.contentZh:
SecureFinAI Contest 2025 获奖通知

热烈祝贺我组学生况紫嫣、仇仪宁、董又中组成的队伍 Fin Sentry 在 ACM ICAIF 2025 – SecureFinAI Contest 2025 中取得优异成绩，分别在 Task I 和 Task II 两个赛道均获 第三名。

比赛由 AI4Finance Foundation 支持，重点面向金融智能体在强化学习交易、金融大模型与合规分析等方向的创新应用。团队在本次竞赛中的表现充分展示了我组在金融智能领域的研究实力。

NEWS.titleZh: 第二届全球数智教育创新大赛获奖通知
NEWS.summary: Congratulations to our student Cao Run for winning the Bronze Award in the AI for Learning Track of the 2nd Global Digital-Intelligence Education Innovation Competition. Jointly organized by the DI-IDEA Alliance and Feishu, this international competition invites university students worldwide to explore future learning models, promote AI-driven educational equity, and develop next-generation AI-powered learning tools. Participants design innovative solutions for various learning scenarios, including personalized learning, intelligent study companions, cross-cultural collaboration, and AI-assisted special education. Cao Run’s project demonstrated strong technical capability and insightful perspectives on AI-enabled future learning, earning recognition from the competition committee. Congratulations to the award recipient.
NEWS.summaryZh: 热烈祝贺我组学生 曹润 在 第二届全球数智教育创新大赛（Global Digital-Intelligence Education Innovation Competition）— AI for Learning 赛道 中荣获 铜奖。该赛事由数智教育发展国际大学联盟（DI-IDEA）与飞书联合举办，面向全球高校学生，旨在探索未来学习模式、推动人工智能赋能教育公平、以及开发新一代 AI 支持学习工具。参赛者围绕个性化学习、智能助教、跨文化协作、辅助特殊教育等多类学习场景，设计基于 AI 技术的创新解决方案。曹润同学在本次竞赛中表现出色，其作品在“AI for Learning”方向展现了扎实的技术能力与对未来学习形态的深刻思考。特此祝贺。
NEWS.content:
Award Announcement | Global Digital-Intelligence Education Innovation Competition 2025

Congratulations to our student Cao Run for winning the Bronze Award in the AI for Learning Track of the 2nd Global Digital-Intelligence Education Innovation Competition.

Jointly organized by the DI-IDEA Alliance and Feishu, this international competition invites university students worldwide to explore future learning models, promote AI-driven educational equity, and develop next-generation AI-powered learning tools. Participants design innovative solutions for various learning scenarios, including personalized learning, intelligent study companions, cross-cultural collaboration, and AI-assisted special education.

Cao Run’s project demonstrated strong technical capability and insightful perspectives on AI-enabled future learning, earning recognition from the competition committee.

Congratulations to the award recipient.
NEWS.contentZh:
第二届全球数智教育创新大赛获奖通知

热烈祝贺我组学生 曹润 在 第二届全球数智教育创新大赛（Global Digital-Intelligence Education Innovation Competition）— AI for Learning 赛道 中荣获 铜奖。

该赛事由数智教育发展国际大学联盟（DI-IDEA）与飞书联合举办，面向全球高校学生，旨在探索未来学习模式、推动人工智能赋能教育公平、以及开发新一代 AI 支持学习工具。参赛者围绕个性化学习、智能助教、跨文化协作、辅助特殊教育等多类学习场景，设计基于 AI 技术的创新解决方案。

曹润同学在本次竞赛中表现出色，其作品在“AI for Learning”方向展现了扎实的技术能力与对未来学习形态的深刻思考。

特此祝贺。
NEWS.title: Award Announcement | Global Digital-Intelligence Education Innovation Competition 2025
Professor Xie Qianqian Attends and Delivers Keynote Report at CCKS 2025 National Conference on Knowledge Graph and Semantic Computing
NEWS.titleZh: 谢倩倩教授参加 CCKS 2025 全国知识图谱与语义计算大会并作专题报告
NEWS.summary: On September 21, 2025, Professor Xie Qianqian from the School of Artificial Intelligence at Wuhan University was invited to attend the CCKS 2025 National Conference on Knowledge Graph and Semantic Computing (China Conference on Knowledge Graph and Semantic Computing), and delivered a keynote academic report entitled "Large Language Models and Applications for Knowledge Augmentation in the Medical Field" at the Medical Knowledge Graph Forum.
NEWS.summaryZh:
2025 年 9 月 21 日，武汉大学人工智能学院谢倩倩教授应邀参加 CCKS 2025 全国知识图谱与语义计算大会（China Conference on Knowledge Graph and Semantic Computing），并在医疗知识图谱论坛作题为
《医疗领域知识增强大语言模型与应用》
的专题学术报告。
NEWS.content:
On September 21, 2025, Prof. Xie Qianqian from the School of Artificial Intelligence, Wuhan University, was invited to attend the CCKS 2025: China Conference on Knowledge Graph and Semantic Computing. She delivered an invited talk at the Medical Knowledge Graph Forum titled:

“Knowledge-Enhanced Large Language Models and Applications in Healthcare”

The China Conference on Knowledge Graph and Semantic Computing (CCKS), organized by the CIPS Technical Committee on Language and Knowledge Computing, originated from CKGS and CSWS. Since the merger in 2016, it has grown into a leading academic conference in China covering knowledge graphs, semantic computing, and related technologies. The conference brings together researchers and practitioners from knowledge representation and reasoning, natural language understanding and knowledge acquisition, graph data management and computation, intelligent question answering, and more.

The theme of CCKS 2025 is “Large Model Agents and Knowledge Computing”, emphasizing accuracy and reliability when empowering LLM-based agents with knowledge graphs.

In her talk, Prof. Xie explored the challenges and opportunities of applying knowledge-enhanced large language models in the medical domain. She discussed the potential of LLMs in medical text understanding, clinical reasoning, and knowledge-grounded generation, while analyzing key challenges such as domain coverage, diagnostic reliability, and explainability.

Key Topics Covered

· Domain Knowledge Injection: Integrating structured and unstructured medical knowledge, multisource clinical and research data, to enhance LLM domain expertise.

· Professional Capability Enhancement: Improving analytical accuracy and decision reliability of LLMs in real-world medical scenarios.

· Application Prospects: Discussing key techniques and future directions for knowledge-enhanced LLMs in healthcare.

This event showcased Prof. Xie’s latest research achievements in natural language processing and artificial intelligence, highlighting her influential role in advancing LLM deployment in vertical professional domains and promoting academic exchange.
NEWS.contentZh:
2025 年 9 月 21 日，武汉大学人工智能学院谢倩倩教授应邀参加 CCKS 2025 全国知识图谱与语义计算大会（China Conference on Knowledge Graph and Semantic Computing）， 并在医疗知识图谱论坛作题为

《医疗领域知识增强大语言模型与应用》

全国知识图谱与语义计算大会由中国中文信息学会语言与知识计算专业委员会主办， 源自中文知识图谱研讨会（CKGS）和中国语义网与万维网科学大会（CSWS）， 自 2016 年合并以来已成为国内知识图谱、语义计算及相关技术领域的核心学术会议。 大会汇聚知识表示与推理、自然语言理解与知识获取、图数据管理与图计算、智能问答等方向的学者与研发人员， 推动学术研究与产业应用的深入交流与合作。

CCKS 2025 大会主题为 “大模型智能体与知识计算”， 聚焦知识图谱支持下的大模型智能体在知识计算方面的准确性与可靠性。

在专题报告中，谢倩倩教授聚焦医疗领域大语言模型的知识增强与应用问题，系统阐述了医疗领域 LLM 在文本理解、 临床推理与生成中的应用潜力，并分析了领域知识覆盖、诊断可靠性与结果可解释性等关键挑战。

报告核心内容

· 领域知识注入：整合结构化与非结构化医学知识，多源异构临床及科研数据，提高模型专业能力。

· 专业能力提升：通过知识增强方法，提升 LLM 在医疗场景中的分析精度与决策可靠性。

· 应用前景探讨：结合研究实践，分享医疗知识增强大语言模型的关键技术与未来发展方向。

此次活动展示了谢倩倩教授在自然语言处理与人工智能方向的最新科研成果， 进一步彰显了她在推动大语言模型在垂直专业领域落地及促进学术交流方面的核心影响力。

On September 10, 2025, on the occasion of Teacher's Day, the research group students prepared flowers and blessings for the teachers, expressing gratitude and respect to the teachers who have diligently guided and supported us. The scene was filled with a warm and joyful atmosphere.

NEWS.title: Teacher's Day
Award Announcement: 2025 CCF-Tencent Rhino Bird Fund
NEWS.titleZh: 2025 年 CCF-腾讯犀牛鸟基金入选喜讯
NEWS.summary: The results of this year's CCF-Tencent Rhino Bird Fund (hereinafter referred to as "Rhino Bird Fund") have been announced.
NEWS.summaryZh: 本年度 CCF-腾讯犀牛鸟基金（以下简称“犀牛鸟基金”）评选结果揭晓，我组指导老师 谢倩倩教授 荣获 2025 年度犀牛鸟基金资助。
NEWS.content:
Award Announcement: 2025 CCF-Tencent Rhino Bird Fund

The results of this year's CCF-Tencent Rhino Bird Fund (hereinafter referred to as "Rhino Bird Fund") have been announced. Our group's advisor, Professor Xie Qianqian, has been awarded the 2025 Rhino Bird Fund grant.

The Rhino Bird Fund was jointly initiated by the China Computer Federation (CCF) and Tencent in 2013, aiming to build a platform for industry-academia collaboration and innovation for young scholars at home and abroad, promoting the application of technology in industrial innovation and social development. Over the past 13 years, the fund has released more than 280 research topics, funded over 290 scientific research fund projects and more than 150 creative fund projects, published over 1100 high-level academic papers, and applied for nearly 400 international and domestic patents.

The 2025 Rhino Bird Fund was open for applications from May 15 to June 15, receiving more than 390 high-quality applications from over 130 universities. The review committee, composed of more than 50 academic and Tencent technical experts, conducted multiple rounds of rigorous reviews on scientific research capabilities, research value, academic innovation, and feasibility of the proposal, ultimately selecting 37 outstanding scholars.

The fund focuses on core technologies and frontier applications of artificial intelligence, including general artificial intelligence, large model applications, reinforcement learning and AI Agents, multimodal perception and interaction, reasoning and planning, as well as industry large models in medical, financial, energy, security, and other fields. At the same time, it responds to national science and technology strategic needs, supporting AI for Science research in frontier areas such as carbon neutrality and protein prediction.

The research group sincerely congratulates Professor Xie Qianqian on this honor and will continue to advance the research and application of core artificial intelligence technologies under the professor's guidance, helping the deep integration of academic and industrial innovation.
NEWS.contentZh:
2025 年 CCF-腾讯犀牛鸟基金入选喜讯

本年度 CCF-腾讯犀牛鸟基金（以下简称“犀牛鸟基金”）评选结果揭晓，我组指导老师 谢倩倩教授 荣获 2025 年度犀牛鸟基金资助。

犀牛鸟基金自 2013 年由中国计算机学会（CCF）与腾讯公司共同发起，旨在为海内外青年学者搭建产学合作创新平台，推动科技在产业创新与社会发展中的应用。13 年来，基金已发布 280 余项研究命题，资助 290 余项科研基金项目和 150 余项创意基金项目，发表高水平学术论文 1100 余篇，申请国际国内专利近 400 项。

2025 年度犀牛鸟基金自 5 月 15 日至 6 月 15 日开放申报，共收到来自 130 余所高校的 390 余份高质量申请。评审委员会由 50 余位学术界与腾讯技术专家组成，经过科研能力、研究价值、学术创新性及方案可行性等多轮严格评审，最终遴选出 37 位优秀学者入选。

基金重点关注人工智能核心技术与前沿应用，包括通用人工智能、大模型应用、强化学习与 AI Agent、多模态感知与交互、推理与规划，以及医疗、金融、能源、安全等行业大模型方向，同时响应国家科技战略需求，支持 AI for Science 在碳中和、蛋白质预测等前沿领域的研究。

课题组衷心祝贺 谢倩倩教授 获此殊荣，也将继续在教授的指导下，推进人工智能核心技术的研究与应用，助力学术与产业创新深度融合。

NEWS.summary: On April 27, 2025, Professor Xie Qianqian from the School of Artificial Intelligence at Wuhan University was invited to attend the 30th MLNLP Symposium and delivered a keynote report entitled "Large Language Model Applications for Vertical Domains: Benchmarks, Models, Agents, and Applications."
NEWS.summaryZh:
2025 年 4 月 27 日，武汉大学人工智能学院谢倩倩教授应邀参加 MLNLP 第三十次学术研讨会，并作题为
《面向垂直领域的大语言模型落地应用：基准、模型、智能体与应用》
的专题学术报告。
NEWS.content:
MLNLP Workshop XXX — Invited Academic Talk Summary

Date: April 27, 2025  |  Speaker: Prof. Xie Qianqian (School of Artificial Intelligence, Wuhan University)
Organizers: MLNLP Community / Youth Working Committee of CCF Chinese Information Processing Society / Special Committee on Large Models and Generation

On April 27, 2025, Prof. Xie Qianqian from the School of Artificial Intelligence at Wuhan University was invited to participate in the 30th MLNLP Academic Workshop. She delivered a keynote talk titled:

“Deploying Large Language Models in Vertical Domains: Benchmarks, Models, Agents, and Applications”

This workshop aimed to promote scholarly exchange on machine learning and natural language processing. In her presentation, Prof. Xie drew upon research practices in finance, medicine, and law to systematically summarize key methodologies and practical explorations for grounding large language models in vertical domains.

Key Research Contributions

  1. FinBen: A comprehensive evaluation benchmark for financial-domain large language models, covering 42 datasets and 24 financial tasks. It integrates agent-based trading evaluation and retrieval-augmented generation to assess model performance across diverse financial scenarios.
  2. Open-FinLLMs: Domain-specific large language models designed for financial NLP, prediction, and decision-making. These models enhance reasoning and understanding capabilities in complex financial contexts.
  3. FinCon: A multi-agent system for financial decision-making. It demonstrates strong performance in collaborative reasoning and supports efficient processing of high-dimensional, multi-variable financial data.
  4. HARMONIC: A privacy-preserving data synthesis framework that enables secure and compliant AI deployment while supporting continuous model iteration without exposing sensitive information.

Prof. Xie’s presentation highlighted her team’s latest advances in applying large language models to vertical domains. She also shared innovative practices in domain-specific evaluation, multi-agent systems, and privacy-preserving technologies, offering valuable insights for both academia and industry.
NEWS.contentZh:
MLNLP 第三十次学术研讨会 — 专题学术报告纪要

报告时间：2025 年 4 月 27 日  |  报告人：谢倩倩 教授（武汉大学人工智能学院）
主办单位：MLNLP 社区 / 中国中文信息学会青年工作委员会 / 中国中文信息学会大模型与生成专业专委会

2025 年 4 月 27 日，武汉大学人工智能学院的谢倩倩教授应邀参加 MLNLP 第三十次学术研讨会，并作题为：

“面向垂直领域的大语言模型落地应用：基准、模型、智能体与应用”

本次研讨会旨在加强国内外学者在机器学习与自然语言处理领域的学术交流。谢倩倩教授在报告中结合金融、医学、法律等专业领域的研究实践，系统分享了推动大语言模型在垂直领域落地的关键方法与探索经验，重点内容包括：

主要成果与项目

  1. FinBen：面向金融领域的大语言模型评测基准，涵盖 42 个数据集、24 项金融任务，并融合智能体交易评估与检索增强生成方法，用以全方位衡量模型在金融场景下的性能与鲁棒性。
  2. Open-FinLLMs：针对金融自然语言处理、预测与决策优化的领域大语言模型，旨在提升模型在复杂金融语境下的理解与推理能力，支持更高质量的行业应用。
  3. FinCon：面向金融决策任务的多智能体系统，在强化金融推理与协作决策中展示应用价值，能够处理高维、多变量的金融数据并辅助复杂决策流程。
  4. HARMONIC：面向隐私保护的数据合成框架，为安全合规的 AI 部署提供保障，支持在保护敏感信息前提下对模型进行持续迭代与优化。

谢倩倩教授的报告不仅展示了团队在大语言模型垂直领域落地的最新研究成果，也分享了在专业评测、智能体系统与隐私保护等方面的创新实践，为学术界与产业界提供了有价值的参考与借鉴。

PROJECTS.title: PIXIU
PROJECTS.description: This repository introduces PIXIU, an open-source resource featuring the first financial large language models (LLMs), instruction tuning data, and evaluation benchmarks to holistically assess financial LLMs. Our goal is to continually push forward the open-source development of financial artificial intelligence (AI).

PROJECTS.title: FinCDM
PROJECTS.description: FinCDM (Financial Cognitive Diagnosis Model) is a comprehensive evaluation framework for financial large language models. It moves beyond traditional score-level evaluation by providing knowledge-skill level diagnosis, identifying what financial skills and knowledge models possess or lack.

PROJECTS.title: DITING
PROJECTS.description: DITING: A Multi-Agent Evaluation Framework for Benchmarking Web Novel Translation

PROJECTS.title: LLMindCraft
PROJECTS.description: Shaping Language Models with Cognitive Insights

CONTACT_DEFAULTS.addressEn: No. 299 Bayi Road, Wuchang District, Wuhan City, Hubei Province, China (School of Artificial Intelligence, Wuhan University)
CONTACT_DEFAULTS.addressZh: 中国湖北省武汉市武昌区八一路299号（武汉大学人工智能学院）
CONTACT_DEFAULTS.introEn:
Welcome to the Center for Language and Information Research (CLAIR)! 👋

The Center for Language and Information Research is an innovative Artificial Intelligence (AI) research center at the School of Artificial Intelligence, Wuhan University. Under the visionary leadership of Professor Min Peng and Professor Qianqian Xie, we are dedicated to pioneering AI through cutting-edge interdisciplinary research and collaboration.

🌍 About Us
Our center provides a dynamic and collaborative research environment, blending theoretical AI breakthroughs with real-world technological innovations.

🚀 How to Get Involved
We invite students, researchers, and AI enthusiasts to actively participate in various capacities:
🤝 Research Collaborations – Join our ongoing projects or propose new research ideas.
💬 Discussion Forums Exchange insights, engage in discussions on AI advancements, and collaborate with experts.
📢 Workshops & Seminars Attend events featuring prominent AI researchers and thought leaders.

📩 Contact Us
Become a part of our expanding community of AI pioneers! Reach out to explore collaboration opportunities and contribute to groundbreaking AI research.

🔗 Let's push the boundaries of AI together at CLAIR! 🚀
CONTACT_DEFAULTS.introZh:
欢迎来到语言与信息研究中心 (CLAIR)! 👋
语言与信息研究中心是武汉大学人工智能学院的一个创新人工智能 (AI) 研究中心。在彭敏教授和谢倩倩教授的远见领导下，我们致力于通过前沿跨学科研究和合作，开创人工智能的新篇章。

🌍 关于我们
我们的中心提供动态且协作的研究环境，将理论AI突破与现实世界的技术创新相结合。
🚀 如何参与
我们邀请学生、研究者和AI爱好者以各种方式积极参与：

🤝 研究合作 – 加入我们正在进行的项目或提出新的研究想法。
💬 讨论论坛 – 交流见解、参与AI进展讨论，并与专家合作。
📢 工作坊与研讨会 – 参加由知名AI研究者和思想领袖主讲的活动。

📩 联系我们
成为我们不断扩大的AI先驱社区的一员！联系我们探索合作机会，并为突破性AI研究贡献力量。
🔗 让我们在CLAIR共同推动AI的边界！🚀
CONTACT_DEFAULTS.hiringTextEn: The Center for Language and Information Research (CLAIR) at Wuhan University welcomes outstanding researchers, postdoctoral fellows, and PhD students in artificial intelligence, natural language processing, and related fields. We are actively recruiting talented individuals to join our team and contribute to cutting-edge research projects. Interested candidates are encouraged to contact Professor Min Peng or the center for collaboration and recruitment opportunities.
CONTACT_DEFAULTS.hiringTextZh: 武汉大学语言与信息研究中心 (CLAIR) 诚邀人工智能、自然语言处理及相关领域优秀研究人员、博士后和博士生加入。我们正在积极招募优秀人才参与前沿研究项目。有意者请联系彭敏教授或中心探讨合作与招聘机会。
